# Series

## Bayesian Statistics Series

The [Bayesian Statistics Series are blogposts](bayesian-statistics.html) that walk you through the awesome homeworks in the Statistical Rethinking book, by Richard McElreath, and the classic Bayesian
Data Analysis, by Gelman et. al. The code is all fully reproducible R Code.

## Fat vs Thin tails and the different nature of risk

Following the work by Nassim Nicholas Taleb, [this series of blogposts](fat-vs-thin-tails.html) goes over his work showcasing
his main results and intuition through code and visualizations.

## Causal Inference Series

Following the work of Judea Pearl, I go [over his main contributions to Causal Inference using code, a bit of math, and visualizations.](causality.html)
